level.heading: Continuation of orders and rules.
level.text: Any orders and rules issued under any law affected by this chapter and in effect on August 5, 1981, and not in conflict with it, continue in effect until modified, superseded, or repealed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-29
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-901.02.
